top_comments.comment: You know what I was in a holding cell once and I would have loved one if those dorms in comparison, get out of your ivory tower Hayes!

comments_since_last_sample.body:
I agree, were into dangerous territory here at home.
The law didn't out a stop to it and neither did the republicans.
I foresee another civil war.
The corruption is too deep, to spread out and too rooted 
Welcome to this Sht-H country.

It’s neo feudalism Chris. Where corp overlords own and control our government and we are forced to give up tax money. I think we need to defund senate to start with. End electoral college and ban corp lobbyists and dark money in all forms of politics. They are bribes
